typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		MANDT as string,
		MATNR as string,
		SPRAS as string,
		ERNAM as string,
		LAEDA as string,
		MTART as string,
		MATKL as string,
		MEINS as string,
		BEGRU as string,
		MAKTX as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> RawSapMaterialData
source(output(
		Number as string,
		Source as string,
		LoadDate as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table',
	staged: false) ~> ExistingMaterials
RawSapMaterialData select(mapColumn(
		Number = MATNR,
		ChangeDate = LAEDA
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectForHub
RawSapMaterialData select(mapColumn(
		Number = MATNR,
		Language = SPRAS,
		CreatedBy = ERNAM,
		ChangeDate = LAEDA,
		MaterialType = MTART,
		MaterialClass = MATKL,
		UnitOfMeasure = MEINS,
		Description = MAKTX
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectForSatellite
SelectForSatellite filter(Language == 'E') ~> EnglishLanguage
SelectForHub derive(Source = 'SAP') ~> AddedSource
AddedSource derive(ChangeDate = toDate(concatWS('-', left(ChangeDate, 4), substring(ChangeDate, 5, 2), substring(ChangeDate, 7, 2)))) ~> ChangeToDate
ChangeToDate, ExistingMaterials join(SelectForHub@Number == ExistingMaterials@Number
	&& ChangeDate > LoadDate,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'right')~> OnlyNewUpdates
EnglishLanguage derive(ChangeDate = toDate(concatWS('-', left(ChangeDate, 4), substring(ChangeDate, 5, 2), substring(ChangeDate, 7, 2)))) ~> ChangeToDate2
OnlyNewUpdates sink(input(
		Number as string,
		Source as string,
		LoadDate as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	staged: true,
	allowCopyCommand: true,
	mapColumn(
		Number,
		Source,
		LoadDate = ChangeDate
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> ToHubMaterial
ChangeToDate2 sink(input(
		Number as string,
		LoadDate as date,
		Language as string,
		Description as string,
		MaterialType as string,
		MaterialGroup as string,
		UnitOfMeasure as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	truncate:true,
	format: 'table',
	staged: true,
	allowCopyCommand: true,
	mapColumn(
		Number,
		LoadDate = ChangeDate,
		Language,
		Description,
		MaterialType,
		MaterialGroup = MaterialClass,
		UnitOfMeasure
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> ToSatMaterial
